contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 15, 1931 D Atherton Contest
Atherton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
atherton-contest
None
Gems of Old England
Alder House Grounds, Atherton, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £5, 4th £3.10s., 5th £1.10s. March contest 1st Abram Colliery, 2nd Westhoughton Old. Best cornet, soprano, horn and trombone - Abram Colliery. Best euphonium - Thornsett. Best flugal - Bolton Borough. Promoted by Atherton Public Band. 9 bands competed.
Oct. 17, 2012, 1:37 p.m. Dec. 16, 2018, 3:41 p.m.
1 Bickershaw Colliery William Halliwell
2 Bolton (Hoover) Band John W. Hughes
3 Thornsett T. Hynes
4 Westhoughton Old H. Holden
5 Atherton Temperance Unknown
